title: "Live music shows abound & other fun things to do in Ann Arbor (Feb. 16-18)"
excerpt: "ANN ARBOR, MI - Music is filling the streets of Ann Arbor this weekend. Venues like The Ark, The Blue Llama Jazz Club and North Star Lounge are bringing a variety of artists to the city with all kinds of musical backgrounds and genres. Here are a few musical performances to check out from Friday, Feb. 16, to Sunday, Feb. 18."
